original: 久聞將軍威名，是否願和本王單挑決勝，不辱<color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color>之名？(選擇拒絕將減少我方士氣值200)
text: I have heard of the general's reputation for a long time, are you willing to compete head-to-head with this king and not shame the name of <color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color>? (Choose to refuse will reduce our morale by 200)
